557730103766290432.text: The Obama Administration has implemented more than $95 Billion in new regulations to business and industry since becoming President.

557729173289328640.text: More than 273,000 people have left the labor force between November and December of 2014.

557728841448574977.text: The number of construction jobs lost since the President took office: 401,000.

557728373959823364.text: 321,000 manufacturing jobs have been lost since Obama became President.

557727534587326464.text: The cost of The President's community college tuition plan over 10 years is $60 Billion.

557726895526387712.text: Increase in debt per capita for Americans since President Obama took office: $21,724.  #SOTU.

557726017289465857.text: The last time the labor force participation rate was at its current level was in 1978.

557725418200236032.text: $1.3 trillion in total student debt held by Americans under President Obama.

557724686432624641.text: Cost of Obamacare's coverage provisions through 2024: $1.8 Trillion.

557724161104420864.text: Median household income has declined by $2,484 since President Obama took office. #SOTU.

557723398877773825.text: 46.5 million Americans now receive food stamps under this President, a record number.

557722703902552064.text: Total debt under President Obama has increased more than $8 trillion.
